response.original_title: In Frame: The Man Behind the Museum Hotels
response.overview: Art collector and entrepreneur Steve Wilson opened the first 21c Museum Hotel in Louisville, KY, a unique hybrid of a boutique hotel and gallery where visitors can experience world-class contemporary art without the cost of museum admission. Follow along as Wilson builds his latest Museum Hotel in Durham, NC, navigating a maze of art fairs and construction sites to bring his vision to life.
response.title: In Frame: The Man Behind the Museum Hotels
